languages.text: "Хвала Злобе, он дает нам возможность не считать оставшиеся до смерти часы".
"Malice deserves credit for giving us something to do other than count the hours until our deaths."
languages.original_text: "Хвала Злобе, он дает нам возможность не считать оставшиеся до смерти часы".

traits.locale_text: "Malice deserves credit for giving us something to do other than count the hours until our deaths."
"Malice deserves credit for giving us something to do other than count the hours until our deaths."
"Malice deserves credit for giving us something to do other than count the hours before our deaths."
"Malice deserves credit for giving us something to do other than count the hours before our deaths."
"Malice deserves credit for giving us something to do other than count the hours until our deaths."
"Malice deserves credit for giving us something to do other than count the hours until our deaths."

languages.text: 「死を待つしかなかった我々にやるべきことを与えてくれたマリスは賞賛に値する」
languages.original_text: "Malice deserves credit for giving us something to do other than count the hours until our deaths."

traits.locale_text: 「死を待つしかなかった我々にやるべきことを与えてくれたマリスは賞賛に値する」

languages.text: “恶棍这人还挺不错的，至少他还让我们有事可做，而不是坐在这里等死。”
languages.original_text: "Malice deserves credit for giving us something to do other than count the hours until our deaths."

traits.locale_text: “恶棍这人还挺不错的，至少他还让我们有事可做，而不是坐在这里等死。”

languages.text: «Hay que reconocer el mérito de Malicia por darnos algo que hacer que no sea contar las horas hasta morir».
languages.original_text: "Malice deserves credit for giving us something to do other than count the hours until our deaths."

traits.locale_text: «Hay que reconocer el mérito de Malicia por darnos algo que hacer que no sea contar las horas hasta morir».

languages.text: "Durch Tücke haben wir wenigstens eine andere Beschäftigung, als die Stunden bis zu unserem Tod zu zählen, das verdient ein Lob."
languages.original_text: "Malice deserves credit for giving us something to do other than count the hours until our deaths."

traits.locale_text: "Durch Tücke haben wir wenigstens eine andere Beschäftigung, als die Stunden bis zu unserem Tod zu zählen, das verdient ein Lob."

languages.text: « S'il y a bien une chose pour laquelle on doit remercier Malice, c'est de nous donner autre chose à faire que compter les heures avant notre mort. »
languages.original_text: "Malice deserves credit for giving us something to do other than count the hours until our deaths."

traits.locale_text: « S'il y a bien une chose pour laquelle on doit remercier Malice, c'est de nous donner autre chose à faire que compter les heures avant notre mort. »

languages.text: "Son anlarımızı ölüm saatimizi bekleyerek geçirmediysek bu, Melanet sayesindedir."
languages.original_text: "Malice deserves credit for giving us something to do other than count the hours until our deaths."

traits.locale_text: "Öleceğimiz ana kadar saatleri saymaktan başka bir şey yapmamızı sağladığı için Melanet'i kutlamak lazım."
